subSections.title: Proper noun
Etymology 3
Noun
Etymology 4
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|へい|yomi=o}}

From {{der|ja|ltc|sort=へい|-}} {{ltc-l|平|id=2}}. The ''{{ll|ja|漢音|kan'on}}'' reading, so likely a later borrowing.
